review: Easy to install, easy to use.  What an investment!  Buy one!!
author: Kevin Hitchcock

review: The fire TV Stick works great not only with Amazon Prime but also with Netflix. I also have my personal photos for a screensaver. The remote control that comes with the Fire Stick makes browsing for movies and shows a breeze. I would highly recommend this device.
author: Karen Wilbur

review: If you use charter and wanted this for HBO, don't bother.
author: Ryan

review: I really like this thing. It is much faster than my old Roku xs.The menu layout is much easier and quicker to maneuver through.Well worth the price.
author: OldGeek

review: With OS 1.5 I'm giving it 4 stars. Mirroring is still a bit bit or miss but 5ghz usually works and there's now an icon.
author: Amazon Customer
